price: 11. Dat is omdat Allah de beschermer is van degenen die geloven en de ongelovigen hebben geen beschermer.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
